information.name: Closing the Gap: Actual vs Plan and Previous Year Progress
information.description: Progress of 3 sales related measures (act, previous year, and plan)
information.author: DataDes-inspidea

dataset.name: Year
dataset.description: for calculation used in Deneb code as well as for tooltip

dataset.name: Sales
dataset.description: calculated combined sales of two years to compare.

dataset.name: Plan
dataset.description: calculated plan. can be either multiple year plan or single year

dataset.name: % vs LY
dataset.description: calculated measure vs previous year for your tooltip in %.
